title: july 30: portland & BLM
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the July 2020 deployment and withdrawal of federal law enforcement in Portland during Black Lives Matter protests. After, Maia revisits the time Justin Timberlake joined the biggest rock concert ever in Toronto, to quite a mixed crowd response. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
